name: Solar Scramble
description:
Two player game created for the 2018 summer ICT Game Jam. Collect stars and avoid meteors to rack up a high score and take over the sky in a battle of day and night!

The game was intended to be played with a PS3 controller, so on screen instructions will reflect as much.

Keyboard Controls:

Player 1 (Sun):  Left - A | Right - D | Jump - W

Player 2 (Moon):  Arrow keys

Start = Space

Select = Escape

Return/Enter will interact with menu buttons.

Music: "Brixton Feelings" | Jukedeck | jukedeck.com
